text: 24|2|vipacaram ceyta pen, vipacaram ceyta an ivarkalil ovvoruvaraiyum nuru kacaiyatikal atiyunkal. Meyyakave ninkal allahvaiyum iruti nalaiyum nampikkai kontavarkalaka iruntal, allah vititta ikkattalaiyai niraiverruvatil, avviruvarkalutaiya visayattil unkalukku irakkam erpatakkutatu. Avviruvarukkum (tantanaiyaka) vetanai kotukkum camayattil nampikkaiyalarkalil oru tokaiyinar atan camipamaka irukkavum
